sources.name: UTMethods
sources.script:
source(output(
		MethodUUID as string,
		MethodName as string,
		MethodDescription as string,
		MethodNEMILink as string,
		ApplicableResourceTypeCV as string,
		MethodTypeCV as string,
		DataCoverageValue as string,
		DataQualityValueCV as string,
		DataConfidenceValue as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTMethods

sinks.name: NormalizedMethods
sinks.script:
UTMethods sink(input(
		MethodUUID as string,
		MethodName as string,
		MethodDescription as string,
		MethodNEMILink as string,
		ApplicableResourceTypeCV as string,
		MethodTypeCV as string,
		DataCoverageValue as string,
		DataQualityValueCV as string,
		DataConfidenceValue as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['methods.csv']) ~> NormalizedMethods
